name: InterviewMe
0:
”Alexa, Interview me”
”Ask me something about heaps”
”Mail it to me”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: interview me
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Do you wish there was someone who would ask you questions and help you prepare for a technical interview ?
Now make alexa do that. Alexa will ask you a question and you can ponder upon it in your leisure time. It won't judge you ;)
You can even ask alexa to email the question to you along with the solution link and a practice link !

This skill will search through question archives scraped from geeks for geeks and ask you a technical interview question appropriate to your skill level and from the topics that you give to it. Once you have heard a low difficulty question, it will go on to a question with higher difficulty rating.

You can also ask alexa to email you the question along with it's source and a practice link in case you are intrigued by the question and want to try it out !

Try out the example phrases such as:
- Alexa interview me
- Ask me something from hashing
- Email it to me
- Can you repeat the question
